NPCs

NPCs (Non-Player Characters) are friendly or neutral characters found throughout the dungeon in Remixed Dungeon. Unlike hostile mobs, NPCs typically offer services, quests, or story elements.

Categories

  • Shopkeeper - Sells items in shops
  • Wandmaker - Specialized wand vendor
  • Ghost - Quest-giver in the prison
  • Imp - Another quest-giving character
  • Princess - Tengu's prisoner in the prison area
  • Healer NPC - Heals and offers services
  • Special NPCs - Unique characters with special functions

Common Services

  • Shops - Items and equipment
  • Quests - Special objectives and rewards
  • Healing - Restoration of health and status
  • Information - Hints and game lore

Mechanics

  • Dialogue - How to interact with NPCs
  • Shops - How to purchase items from NPCs

See Also

  • Mobs - Other mobile characters in the game
  • Items - Items related to NPCs
